RangerLevel4Spells.Name: Conjure Woodland Beings
RangerLevel4Spells.Description: You summon fey creatures that appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range.

RangerLevel4Spells.Name: Freedom of Movement
RangerLevel4Spells.Description: The target can freely move and ignore difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce the target's speed or cause the target to be restrained.

RangerLevel4Spells.Name: Locate Creature
RangerLevel4Spells.Description: You sense the direction to the creature's location, as long as that creature is within 1,000 feet of you.

RangerLevel4Spells.Name: Stoneskin
RangerLevel4Spells.Description: You touch a creature and grant it resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
